display_information.name: Pod-Observer
display_information.description: Pod Observer Allows You To Get Information About Your K8s Cluster!
display_information.long_description: Pod Observer is a Slack bot designed for developers working with Kubernetes. It enables users to retrieve vital information about their running pods within a Kubernetes cluster, including details about active pods and their logs. This tool streamlines access to critical data, enhancing productivity and facilitating efficient management of Kubernetes environments.
